TopicTitle: All Agencies have been replaced by one, even retroactively

Articles.Content:
[http://i.imgur.com/cMKsCcz.png](http://i.imgur.com/cMKsCcz.png)

Retroactively, every agency has been replaced by the one included with RasterPropMonitor. This includes contracts already completed under other agencies. This problem did not actually start when I installed RPM.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T00:33:38Z" title="06/20/2015 12:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by TomatoSoup**
